text: Mahmud Us Samad Chowdhury (মাহমুদ উস সামাদ চৌধুরী) (3 January 1955 – 11 March 2021) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was a member of the Bangladesh Awami League. In 2014, Chowdhury was elected to the Jatiya Sangsad. He was born in Dhaka. Chowdhury died on 11 March 2021 from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Bangladesh in Dhaka, aged 66. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bangladeshi politicians Category:Bangladeshi Muslims Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bangladesh Category:People from Dhaka Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:10th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:11th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Mahmud Us Samad Chowdhury
